/A-AO.description: Workflow Orchestrator Agent - Plan and execute complex multi-step workflows

/A-SM.description: SQL MCP Agent - Database queries and operations

/A-TX.description: Transactions Agent - Data processing and CRUD operations

/A-FP.description: Frontend Pages Agent - Create and modify React pages

/A-TV.description: Table Views Agent - Data tables and grids

/A-NAV.description: Navigation Agent - Menus and navigation components

/A-EX.description: Excel MCP Agent - Excel file processing and analysis

/A-AUTH.description: Authentication Agent - Login, permissions, and security

/A-API.description: API Bridge Agent - REST endpoints and data flow

/A-BC.description: Backend Control Agent - Admin panels and system config

/A-GAP.description: Gap Analyzer Agent - Find missing features and analyze architecture

/A-ROUTE.description: Router Agent - Intelligent request routing to best agent

/A-LIST.description: List all available agents and their capabilities
